The spirit of the church-faction detected, in its nature and operations more particularly in the mystery of the convocation-book lately published and exposed to the view and censure of the world by the late Arch-Bishop of Canterbury, and the progress of the faction, and the mischiefs thereof, the late civil war, and our present disappointments. Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.
[3], 44 p.
[s.n.], London : Printed in the year 1691.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
